00080 class modbaker_exception : public runtime_error
00081 {
00082     public:
00083         // Constructors
00084         modbaker_exception(const string &error)
00085                 : std::runtime_error(error) { };
00086 
00087         modbaker_exception(const string &error, const string &filename)
00088                 : std::runtime_error(error), _which(filename) { };
00089 
00090         virtual ~modbaker_exception() throw() { }
00091 
00092         // Public interace
00093         virtual const char *which() const throw()
00094         {
00095             return _which.c_str();
00096         }
00097 
00098     private:
00099         // Member variables
00100         string _which;
00101 };
